product_name: Union Flite Lady Snowboard Bindings - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: With a women-specific fit, cushioned EVA bushings, and a lightweight design, the Union Flite Lady bindings are your ticket to comfort and performance in the park. Flite bases are built specifically for women; they're made with DuPont(TM) Zytel(R) ST nylon in a super lightweight, low-profile, freestyle-oriented design. Baseplates are designed to be supremely strong with the smallest footprint possible; this promotes free, even board flex for sweet response, board control and durability. Injected EVA bushings damp vibrations underfoot, promoting a comfortable ride and smooth, even board flex with no dead spots. Extruded aluminum heel cups undergo an anodizing process that further increases their strength by 30%; they'll maintain their shape no matter how much wear and tear they see. DuPont Zytel ST highbacks maintain flexibility and strength in a wide range of temperatures; they provide lightweight, easy mobility; tool-free forward lean. Contoured and padded ankle straps keep feet comfortably locked in; straps adjust without tools. Multi-position toe straps fit a wide range of boots; injected aluminum buckles. Flite Lady bindings are compatible with Burton The Channel M6 snowboards.
short_description: With a women-specific fit, cushioned EVA bushings, and a lightweight design, the Union Flite Lady bindings are your ticket to comfort and performance in the park.
